title: [K-12] Language Proficiency Improvement Course Through Peer Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Proficiency and Elementary-Level Language Comprehension
context.additional_context: Learners from diverse backgrounds collaborate in small groups on language tasks. Asynchronous interaction occurs via LMS bulletin boards/discussion forums

learning_goals: Learners can improve grammatical accuracy by 20% or more through peer feedback-based writing assignments.
Learners enhance communication skills by actively participating (at least three times) in five small-group discussions.
Learners achieve 4 points or higher (on a 5-point scale) in satisfaction surveys based on collaborative experiences with peers in final projects.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
